org.lenskit.bias

Interface BiasModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlobalBiasModel, ItemBiasModel, LiveUserItemBiasModel, UserBiasModel, UserItemBiasModel, ZeroBiasModel

    public interface BiasModel

    Interface for bias models that can be based on the user, item, or both.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getIntercept()
      Get the global bias (intercept).
      double getItemBias(long item)
      Get the item bias.
      Long2DoubleMap getItemBiases()
      Get the map of all known item biases.
      Long2DoubleMap getItemBiases(LongSet items)
      Get a set of item biases.
      double getUserBias(long user)
      Get the user bias.
      Long2DoubleMap getUserBiases()
      Get the map of all known user biases.
      Long2DoubleMap getUserBiases(LongSet users)
      Get a set of user biases.

    • Method Detail

      • getIntercept

        double getIntercept()

        Get the global bias (intercept).

        Returns:
        The global bias.

      • getUserBias

        double getUserBias(long user)

        Get the user bias.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        Returns:
        The bias for the specified user, or 0 if the user’s bias is unknown.

      • getUserBiases

        Long2DoubleMap getUserBiases(LongSet users)

        Get a set of user biases.

        Parameters:
        users - The users whose biases are to be returned.
        Returns:
        A mapping from user IDs to biases. It is not guaranteed to contain all user IDs in its key set, but its Long2DoubleMap.defaultReturnValue() will be 0.

      • getUserBiases

        Long2DoubleMap getUserBiases()

        Get the map of all known user biases.

        Returns:
        The set of all user biases.

      • getItemBias

        double getItemBias(long item)

        Get the item bias.

        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        Returns:
        The bias for the specified ite, or 0 if the item’s bias is unknown.

      • getItemBiases

        Long2DoubleMap getItemBiases(LongSet items)

        Get a set of item biases.

        Parameters:
        items - The items whose biases are to be returned.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to biases. It is not guaranteed to contain all item IDs in its key set, but its Long2DoubleMap.defaultReturnValue() will be 0.

      • getItemBiases

        Long2DoubleMap getItemBiases()

        Get the map of all known item biases.

        Returns:
        The set of all item biases.
